title: Can anyone help me with this Grotesque?
content:
As stated, i need help finding this font. A clue might be with the capitol “I”.

Thanks!

author: Rene Josdal

comments.content:
Why don’t you upload the image to this site?

i think it must be [akkurat](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015171524/http:/lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Text+Fonts/Akkurat/Normal).  
look at the 0 wish the slash.
